me.donkeycore.minigamemanager.core

Class MinigameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.donkeycore.minigamemanager.core.MinigameManager

  • public final class MinigameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Main MinigameManager plugin class with API methods
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    DonkeyCore

        Returns:

      • registerMinigame

        public void registerMinigame(java.lang.Class<? extends Minigame> minigame,
                             int minimumPlayers)
        Register a minigame with MinigameManager and insert it into the rotations
        Note: The class must have a MinigameAttributes annotation
        Parameters:
        minigame - The minigame to register
        minimumPlayers - The minimum players required to start this minigame

      • unregisterMinigame

        public boolean unregisterMinigame(java.lang.Class<? extends Minigame> minigame)
        Unregister a minigame with MinigameManager and remove it from the rotations
        Parameters:
        minigame - The minigame to unregister
        Returns:
        Whether the minigame was removed

      • addListener

        public void addListener(Minigame minigame,
                        java.lang.Class<? extends org.bukkit.event.Event> event,
                        Minigame.EventListener listener)
        Add listeners for a minigame for a certain event
        Parameters:
        minigame - The minigame that hosts this listener
        event - The event to listen for
        listener - What to do when the event happens

      • clearListeners

        public void clearListeners(Minigame minigame)
        Clear all listeners for a certain minigame
        Parameters:
        minigame - The minigame to clear listeners forO
